title: IRenderMaterial.DoubleSided
description: Gets or sets whether to enable shading from both sides of a surface when rendering a model using a ray-trace rendering engine.
returns: True to enable shading from both sides, false to not
remarks:
This method is only available when a ray-trace rendering engine is loaded.
NOTES:
When this property is disabled, surfaces that do not face the camera seem invisible.
Double-sided surfaces can cause rendering errors. Use sparingly.
